Module.Name: global-scan-to-sql
Module.Description: Analyze Globals by Subscript-Level to SQL
Module.AfterInstallMessage: Just providing the global name results in a full global dump. Example: USER>zn "irisapp" IRISAPP>d $system.SQL.Shell() SQL Command Line Shell SELECT * FROM rcc_G.scan where rcc_G.Scan('^%SYS',1)=1 SELECT * FROM rcc_G.scan where rcc_G.Scan('^%SYS',2)=1 SELECT * FROM rcc_G.scan where rcc_G.Scan('^ERRORS',37)=1 and id['Jour'
